title: The Aviation Recipe
full_text:
The Aviation Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
3/4
ounce
freshly squeezed lemon juice
2
teaspoons
maraschino liqueur
Optional:
1
teaspoon
crème de violette
Directions
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker; fill with ice, and shake well for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass; garnish with a cherry. For the Biplane Version of The Aviation, include crème de violette. For Jet-Age version, leave it out.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
